short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate conversations directly within ChatGPT to your native language and maximize its power.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Choose from more than 200 languages and translate your ChatGPT conversations into your preferred language with a single click.
Unfortunately, ChatGPT is not equally proficient in all languages, and often we have to deal with answers in languages we don't manage well (such as English). With this extension, you can translate all responses into your native language with a single click, so you don't lose any details from the answers provided by ChatGPT, no matter which language it responds in.
